title: Almost all adolescents in an economically disadvantaged urban population exposed to tobacco smoke

title_detail.value: Almost all adolescents in an economically disadvantaged urban population exposed to tobacco smoke

summary: Ninety-four percent of adolescents ages 13 to 19 in an economically disadvantaged, largely minority population in San Francisco had measurable levels of a biomarker specific for exposure to tobacco smoke (NNAL).

summary_detail.value: Ninety-four percent of adolescents ages 13 to 19 in an economically disadvantaged, largely minority population in San Francisco had measurable levels of a biomarker specific for exposure to tobacco smoke (NNAL).
